project.title: Project Mocha
project.description:
üåç The Challenge We‚Äôre Tackling
Smallholder coffee farmers in Kenya, who produce some of the world‚Äôs finest Arabica coffee, face systemic challenges in accessing fair markets and financial resources. Despite contributing to a $200 billion global coffee industry, these farmers capture less than 10% of the value due to undocumented assets, climate risks, and exploitation by intermediaries. Productivity remains alarmingly low at 0.2 kg/tree compared to a potential of 1.5‚Äì2.5 kg/tree. Without financial inclusion, farmers cannot invest in critical inputs like fertilizers or modern practices, perpetuating poverty and environmental degradation. If left unaddressed, these issues will continue to erode livelihoods and the sustainability of Kenya's coffee sector.

üìú Our Solution
Project Mocha revolutionizes coffee farming by leveraging blockchain technology to tokenize coffee trees and beans, enabling farmers to access on-chain liquidity for farm rehabilitation and productivity investments. By geo-tagging trees and integrating IoT sensors for productivity tracking, we ensure transparency, traceability, and fair pricing. Our approach aims to empower over 700,000 smallholder farmers while addressing climate risks through agroforestry practices that enhance biodiversity and carbon sequestration. This model not only boosts productivity by up to 300% but also creates a sustainable financial ecosystem that benefits both farmers and global investors.

Our team collaborates with smallholder farmers, agronomists, blockchain developers, and financial experts to create a transparent value chain that enhances farmer livelihoods while promoting environmental sustainability.

See Our Impact: https://www.ecocertain.xyz/hypercert/42220-0x16bA53B74c234C870c61EFC04cD418B8f2865959-55125743441192031081066686403946450255872 

What This Hypercert Represents
This hypercert captures Project Mocha‚Äôs transformative actions: tokenizing 2,000 coffee trees in Phase 1 (2025), geo-tagging assets for proof of reserves, and providing liquidity to farmers. The impact includes increased yields, improved farmer incomes, enhanced biodiversity through agroforestry practices, and transparent supply chains.

Why Support Us; Coffee consumption is growing but coffee production is decreasing. By supporting us, you are helping create a profitable , sustainable coffee production model that empowers smallholder coffee farmers 

 Proof That It‚Äôs Working
Data: Phase 1 has geo-tagged 2,000 trees with IoT sensors tracking productivity, Images and videos of farm activities: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1a0hXZTYnEmWOtXUA2JOVwk2cDszHV9Y3?usp=sharing
